opennlp.ccg.synsem
Interface SignScorer

All Known Subinterfaces:
ReRankingScorer
All Known Implementing Classes:
FactoredNgramModel, FactoredNgramModelFamily, GenerativeSyntacticModel, KenNgramModel, LexLogProbFeatureExtractor, LinearNgramScorerCombo, NgramPrecisionModel, NgramScorer, PerceptronScorer, RepetitionScorer, ReRankingPerceptronScorer, SequenceScorer, SignScorerInterpolation, SignScorerProduct, SRILMNgramModel, StandardNgramModel
public interface SignScorer

Interface for sign scoring models.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $, $Date: 2008/11/09 02:59:49 $
Author:
Michael White

Field Summary
static SignScorer nullScorer
          A scorer that returns 0 for all signs.
 
Method Summary
 double score(Sign sign, boolean complete)
          Returns a score for the given sign and completeness flag, where higher numbers are better than lower numbers.
 

Field Detail

nullScorer

static final SignScorer nullScorer
A scorer that returns 0 for all signs.

Method Detail

score

double score(Sign sign,
             boolean complete)
Returns a score for the given sign and completeness flag, where higher numbers are better than lower numbers. When normalized, returns a score between 0 (worst) and 1 (best).
